scripts.start: node -e "const express = require('express'); const app = express(); app.get('/', (req, res) => res.json({status: 'Railway Express working!', time: new Date()})); app.get('/api/vendors', (req, res) => res.json([{id: 1, name: 'McKesson'}, {id: 3, name: 'Kinray'}])); app.listen(process.env.PORT || 5000, '0.0.0.0', () => console.log('Express server running'));"
